brand.name: Oahu Car Rentals
brand.tagline: Simple, fast car rentals on Oʻahu

notices.trackerNotice: Each of our vehicles is equipped with GPS tracking. Any attempt to tamper with or disable the tracking device voids the rental agreement, and the vehicle may be reported stolen.
notices.trackerNoticeFaq: Each vehicle is equipped with a GPS tracker for security and recovery. Tampering with, disabling, or removing a tracker violates the rental agreement and may result in the vehicle being reported as stolen.

home.description: Need a car for your trip? We make it easy to get a quick quote with no hassle. Choose your dates and we'll confirm availability fast. Pickup and drop-off are straightforward with local support. Clean cars, fair prices, and a smooth start to your island time.
home.referralText: We offer referral bonuses for connecting us with renters or buyers—send them our way and we'll take care of the rest.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We're a local Oʻahu operation focused on clean cars, straightforward pickup, and quick responses. Our goal is to make your rental easy so you can spend more time enjoying the island.

items.question: What do I need to rent?
items.answer: A valid driver's license and proof of valid insurance. We'll confirm details when you request.

items.question: Can I pick up at the airport?
items.answer: Yes—tell us your preferred pickup location in the request notes. Yes, we offer delivery anywhere on Island for an additional fee depending on time of delivery and location.

items.question: Do you allow same-day requests?
items.answer: Often yes, depending on availability. Submit a request and we'll respond quickly.

items.question: Do you offer beach supply rentals and child seats?
items.answer: Yes we do, depending on availability. We charge a small additional fee.

items.question: What is the walk-around form?
items.answer: The Walk-Around Form is used at both pickup and return to document the vehicle's condition and note any existing or new damage.

items.question: Where can I find roadside help information?
items.answer: Keep the Roadside Assistance Information document accessible during your rental. It outlines common issues and the steps to take if you need help.

items.question: How do I report a claim or incident?
items.answer: If an accident, damage, or other incident occurs, complete the Claim Reporting Form to provide the details we'll need to assist you.

request.title: Request a Quote
request.subtitle: Tell us what you need and we'll reply with availability + pricing.

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.notes: If you selected 'Specific car from gallery', please specify which car here. Pickup location? Number of guests? Car seat needed?

messages.dateError: ❌ End date must be after start date.
messages.success: ✅ Request received — we'll email you shortly.
messages.error: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again.

requestSuccess.title: ✅ Request received
requestSuccess.message: Thanks! We'll be in contact shortly with availability and next steps.

mileageOut.title: Mileage & Fuel (Pickup)
mileageOut.instructions: Please enter the current mileage and fuel level at pickup, and upload a clear photo of the dashboard showing both.

messages.submitted: Thanks! Your pickup mileage and fuel have been recorded.

mileageIn.title: Mileage & Fuel (Return)
mileageIn.instructions: Please enter the current mileage and fuel level at return, and upload a clear photo of the dashboard showing both.
mileageIn.reviewInstructions: We'd love to hear about your experience! Your feedback helps us improve.

messages.thanks: Thanks — your return mileage and fuel have been recorded.

signedContract.title: Upload Signed Contract
signedContract.instructions: Please upload a clear photo scan of your signed contract (PDF).

messages.chooseFile: Please choose the signed contract PDF.

customerSuccess.title: Thank you!
customerSuccess.message: Your information has been submitted successfully.
customerSuccess.contactMessage: If you need to correct or update anything, please contact us.
